metadata.title: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone" - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: Collaboration is the basis of learning at Inteli. Discover how PBL transforms theory into exchange, interaction and the collective construction of knowledge.

content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"

content_blocks.text: I have dedicated a significant part of my career to research into collaboration and, specifically, thePBL (Project-Based Learning) methodologyand its ramifications. And if there's one thing I believe with all my might, it's that meaningful learning flourishes in interaction, in the exchange of knowledge and in the synergy that only happens when people work together.
content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"

content_blocks.text: Bringing in a bit of theory, Dillenbourg and Schneider (1995) argue thatcollaborative activitiesinvolve actions in which the person has to explain what they think to their partner. Those who listen come into contact with new knowledge, and those who explain have the opportunity to verbalize and elaborate their own knowledge in order to be understood by others.
content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"

content_blocks.text: The social dimension also benefits from collaboration. Collaborative activities involve constantfeedbackbetween people. This requires intellectual effort on both sides in order to understand each other.
content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"

content_blocks.text: One of the most fascinating parts of collaborative learning is how it becomes a two-way street.With every interaction, everyone involved has the opportunity to be both teacher and student.This constant exchange of roles enriches our understanding and skills in ways that wouldn't be possible otherwise. Therein lies the real magic of collaboration.
content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"

content_blocks.text: Reflecting on our journey at Inteli, we can clearly see how the collaborative approach is ingrained in our culture, as we believe that this exchange of knowledge is the essence of a true learning community.
content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"

content_blocks.text: Everyone has something valuable to offer.As we continue down this path of discovery and growth, I hope that each of you will find inspiration in the beauty of collaborative learning.
content_blocks.section: "To paraphrase Tom Jobim, it's impossible to learn alone"
